title: She Should Not Have Two Good Men
itunes:title: She Should Not Have Two Good Men
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 45 year old single black female. My best friend is a 55 year old married female. She and I are on the same dating website. Yes, she’s married. Recently she told me that she has fallen in love with one of the guys she met on the site. They have been seeing each other for 2 years. Her husband is clueless. He takes care of her. She does not have to work and he is a great provider. On the other hand, the guy that she is in love with is single and he has no idea that she is married......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
